title: Ted Baker showing some style
content:
At the weekend I noticed a carry bag promoting Ted Baker’s sale. Can anyone help me identify the typeface or suggest a similar one.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Ted Baker1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232156/http:/typophile.com/files/Ted%20Baker1.jpg) | 99.28 KB |

 [‹ ITALIC and SMALL CAP](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232156/http:/typophile.com/node/40967 "Go to previous forum topic") [Circus-y, turn-of-the-century display face a la Emigre's Brothers ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232156/http:/typophile.com/node/40960 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Monkeyboy
